response.job_title: Chemical Process Engineer - National University of Colombia
response.summary:
During my professional career, I have had the opportunity to gain experience as a commercial technical representative, giving support to key clients in Oil&Gas, water treatment, personal care and pharmaceutical areas, in addition to having experience in the production area operating facilities for the treatment of heavy crude oils. Corrosion control and integrity of lines, with handling and identification of chemical substances according to the GHS. Likewise, I have advanced knowledge of office automation tools such as Excel, Power Point and programming software.

I have the ability to adapt to highly competitive environments and I am used to working in multidisciplinary teams. In addition, I like to share my knowledge and make decisions in favor of the fulfillment of objectives and mutual growth.
response.skills: Desarrollo de oportunidades de negocio, Ventas y marketing, Negociación con proveedores, Análisis de negocio, Negociación, Ventas, Servicio de atención al cliente, Resolución de problemas, Comunicación, Ingeniería, Simulación de procesos, Diseño de procesos, Optimización de procesos, Aspen HYSYS, Simulacion de procesos, Hojas de cálculo, Microsoft Excel, Gams, Aspen Plus, Aspen PIMS

profile_positions.description:
• Provide commercial technical support to key Oil & Gas and water treatment customers.
• Negotiation of raw materials with suppliers according to a market analysis.
• Analysis of market indicators for sale and purchase projection.
• Analysis of margin, costs and inventories in order to optimize profits.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative in Oil&Gas and Water Treatment

profile_positions.description:
• Provide commercial technical support to different clients in personal and pharmaceutical care.
• Negotiation of raw materials with suppliers according to a market analysis.
• Planning of chemical consumption of the different assigned clients.
• Generate strategies for each of the assigned accounts in order to guarantee the purchase of products.
• Analysis of market indicators for sale and purchase projection.
• Analysis of margin, costs and inventories in order to optimize profits.
profile_positions.title: Sales Representative in Personal Care

profile_positions.description:
•	Simulation of heavy oil lines and facilities

•	Monitoring of chemical control variables and line integrity based on NACE standards
Achievements: Increase in the field's structure operation compliance rate from 70% to 90%.
